query:
SELECT aa.id, aa.account_name, aa.marketplace, aa.profile_id, aa.connection_status,
       aac.region, aac.sync_status, aac.last_sync_at, aac.token_expires_at
FROM ad_accounts aa 
LEFT JOIN amazon_api_credentials aac ON aa.id = aac.id 
WHERE aa.status = 'active';
